page.title: 02AYLMERTON
page.content: The village is effectively divided into two by the A148 Cromer to Holt road. Properties to the north of the road are largely set in{woodland}. Most houses are south of the road near the church, and are surrounded by {farmland. } Of a significant number of{villagers} interviewed, 43% came to the village from outside Norfolk and 39% from within a 10 kilometre radius of the village. Half have lived in the village for more than 10 years, with one man born in the village 84 years ago. Opinion is divided as to whether the village could be improved or not. While some thought{improvements } (street lighting, shop, public transport, for example) could be made, others like it as it is and wish to see{no change. }
